rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that doubles as a waiting area, with Vastu considerations ensuring the door is aligned to favorable directions.
Open-plan living space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light. The layout respects the Vastu principle of a well-defined central area with clear sightlines.
Compact yet efficient kitchen, positioned away from the living areas, in accordance with Vastu for optimal energy flow. Built with budget-friendly materials.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the kitchen and living area for communal meals. Windows ensure natural lighting and ventilation.
A dedicated guest room, designed with simplicity in mind while ensuring privacy and following Vastu guidelines by positioning it on the left side of the house.
Spacious master bedroom that doubles as a retreat. Features direct access to private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows and is oriented for positive Vastu alignment.

openings.description: Primary entryway designed to enhance energy flow as per Vastu.
Large windows to maximize natural light and provide a view of the outdoors.
Provides direct access to a small balcony with privacy screens.

rooms.description: Dedicated gym area featuring budget-friendly, multipurpose equipment. Designed to maximize space and provide a functional workout environment.
Additional bedroom with simple design elements ensuring sufficient light and ventilation.
Compact bathroom designed to serve both bedrooms. Features efficient layout for water usage and natural lighting.

openings.description: Direct staircase connecting ground and first floors. The location complies with local building norms.
